properties.description:
Datatrics is a SaaS platform designed to help online retailers know their customers and understand their behavior. We’re on a mission to remove the “mass” from marketing with software tools that focus on customers as individuals with unique needs and interests. 

Datatrics  software employs the state-of-the-art in customer analytics methodologies and integrates directly with email providers to help marketers deliver more relevant, meaningful communications. Datatrics  are excited to work with some of the leading domestic e-commerce innovators including Schiphol Group, Siemens, Giant, McGregor and many more retailers spread through the the world. 

Datatrics  office is located in Oldenzaal, The Netherlands. Datatrics  work hard, work together, and care deeply about building a business and a culture that will have a positive impact on the world.
properties.short_description: Datatrics uses Big Data and Predictive Analytics to combine all your data into useful insights and sales opportunities.
properties.name: Datatrics
